Package it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.clients.viewer.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GUI extends javafx.application.Application implements UI
Method GUI is used to create the Graphical User Interface of the game.
Author:
Alessio Piovesan, Pier Giorgio Prosperi, Matteo Salamone

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup() throws IOException
      Method setup creates all the stage phases which will be updated in other methods, in particular: - MENU: the game's main menu with Single Player, Multi Player and Quit. - SETUP: small windows containing player's inserted nickname, the server IP and port; - LOADER: the game loader. - GUI: the effective game GUI. Each stage scene is put inside an hashmap, which links their name to their fxml filename.
      Throws:
      IOException

      private void prepareResForWarehouse​(Colours colour, int qnt)

    • prepareResForWarehouseS

      private void prepareResForWarehouseS​(Colours colour, int qnt)
      method prepareResForWarehouse is the method used to place resources in the warehouse. The same method is used whenever a resource is taken from the warehouse by subtracting the value instead of adding it
      Parameters:
      colour - is a colour
      qnt - is the quantity of the selected resource

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange​(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      method propertyChange is part of the Observer Pattern that can react to Model's changes. TEMPORARYLEADERCARDS : starts the GUI and calls for changeStage.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - is an event
      See Also:
      changeStage(String), start(Stage)
